install.packages("MASS")
library(MASS)

data <- read.csv("C:/Users/yalav/OneDrive/Documents/module 4 R/Salaries.csv")

male_salaries <- data$salary[data$sex == "Male"]
female_salaries <- data$salary[data$sex == "Female"]

t_test_result <- t.test(male_salaries, female_salaries, var.equal = FALSE)

print(t_test_result)


# Before and after workshop sleep quality scores
before <- c(4.6, 7.8, 9.1, 5.6, 6.9, 8.5, 5.3, 7.1, 3.2, 4.4)
after <- c(6.6, 7.7, 9.0, 6.2, 7.8, 8.3, 5.9, 6.5, 5.8, 4.9)

# Perform two-sample t-test
t_test <- t.test(before, after, alternative = "less", paired = FALSE)

# Print the results
print(t_test)

# Perform two-sample t-test with Î± = 0.1
t_test_alpha_01 <- t.test(before, after, alternative = "less", paired = FALSE, conf.level = 0.9)

# Print the results
print(t_test_alpha_01)
